channel.title: Obsidian | Oldschool | Not a remake!
channel.description:
[b]Please note this is not a remake [/b] This is a late Development thread a lot has been done. will work on the layout for now just going to post a few images.... [center]Features
Working woodcutting Amazing oldschool feel No Godswords or any overpowered items Great economy Great Starter base Very straightforward server Working firemaking Working Cooking Working Woodcutting with Stumps Working Runecrafting Working Agility And many more skills No items over 369 Relive that oldschool feeling Working Purple Sweets ! Home teleport no longer requires 1 law rune other teleports do Full 63 waves jad Tz kih now drains prayer Starter pack edited removed 250k and d scimitar D mace bug fixed Dagannoth kings added working great ! Home moved back to Draynor Recipe for disaster soon to be added Elemental workshop soon to be added Dagannoths require a team of 2-3 players Many more updates soon to come ! Cooks Assistant Quest added will post vid soon ! Sailing has been added will post a vid soon ! Creating SplitBark Added ! 100% credits to vox Cracking Wallsafes Weapon Sounds Added Music Added Item animations added ! Clue Scrolls Four fully functional quests added !
Many colours to choose from ! [img]http://puu.sh/YJgo[/img] Bet with friends using mithril seeds ! [img]http://puu.sh/YJhT[/img] 420 Interfaces [img]http://puu.sh/YJQx[/img] Working crafting [img]http://puu.sh/YJrT[/img] Four fully working quests and all of them unique ! [img]http://puu.sh/YJsf[/img] Working Firemaking [img]http://puu.sh/YJxk[/img] Working Woodcutting [img]http://puu.sh/YJAG[/img] Fletching (u) [img]http://puu.sh/YJBU[/img] Stringing Bows [img]http://puu.sh/YJFe[/img] Pick Flax [img]http://puu.sh/YJHO[/img] Alot of bossing [img]http://www.rooneyscape.com/images/kbd.gif[/img] Our custom quest :) [youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=74zuSPz8QsM&[/youtube][/center]

item.title: Obsidian | Oldschool | Not a remake!
item.dc:creator: @Lin Lin
item.description:
@Lin wrote:

Hopefully it’s better than RooneyScape. That server, although fun for a small amount of time, lacked quality and long-term playability.

Read full topic

Please note this is not a remake

This is a late Development thread a lot has been done.

will work on the layout for now just going to post a few images…

[center]Features

Working woodcutting Amazing oldschool feel No Godswords or any overpowered items Great economy Great Starter base Very straightforward server Working firemaking Working Cooking Working Woodcutting with Stumps Working Runecrafting Working Agility And many more skills No items over 369 Relive that oldschool feeling Working Purple Sweets !
